review: Confirmed appointment given through SMS and Email .  I came from Agra UP and paid consultation fee Rs 900 of Dr Mukherjee (27 year experience ) but Dr Mukherjee was out of station . Management shifted the consultation with Dr Avinash Verma ***** * **** *********** without my willing who charged the consultation fee Rs 700 only . But I paid Rs 900 , I feel bed experience.

Doctor timing is questionable, no one is ready to update on doctor timing and availability.
Waiting is more and not satisfied.
